titleStmt.title: A proposal for the raising the summe of two hundred thousand pounds or more per annum as a fund or security for advancing moneys for the service of the government, with great ease to the subject.
titleStmt.author: T. H.

notesStmt.note: At end of text: By T.H.
With docket title: A proposal for raising a supply of two hundred thousand pounds per annum, and upwards, by a certain duty upon hatts.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
